title: Teachers is smart
author: VD
content_html: Okay, so it appears I may have overestimated the average intelligence of teachers when I calculated it at around 90 IQ.  Mea culpa.  Now, here’s the damning quote: “Every other student in class accepted my lesson without argument….”  Keep in mind that’s almost surely true of your public-schooled children too, even when they are being taught that black is white and kilometers are longer than miles.
content_text:
Okay, so it appears I may have overestimated the average intelligence of teachers when I calculated it at around 90 IQ.  Mea culpa.  Now, here’s the damning quote:
“Every other student in class accepted my lesson without argument….”
Keep in mind that’s almost surely true of your public-schooled children too, even when they are being taught that black is white and kilometers are longer than miles.
